scripts.docs: typedoc --name 'MongoDB Stitch Web SDK' --out ./docs --mode file --tsconfig tdconfig.json --readme README.md  packages/browser/core/src/index.ts packages/core/sdk/src/index.ts packages/core/services/*/src/index.ts packages/browser/services/*/src/index.ts --ignoreCompilerErrors --excludeNotExported --theme minimal
